content.label: SEPARATE BY `,` FOR NON-EXACT MATCHES USE `*`

content.title: üëë  You're back in charge!
content.description: Please be aware that if you don't return within **{absentMinutes}** minutes, the channel will once again become available for other members to claim.

content.title: ü§∑  You are already in
content.description: Your intentions are clear - you've already nominated yourself as a potential owner of this channel.

content.title: üòà  Channel might be yours
content.description:
You've put yourself forward as a potential owner of this channel.
Good luck!

content.title: üó≥Ô∏è  You have voted for {userDisplayName}
content.description: Your vote has been cast in favor of <@{userId}> taking ownership of this channel.

content.title: üó≥Ô∏è  You already voted for {userDisplayName}
content.description: Your vote has been already cast in favor of <@{userId}>, you can vote for someone else if you changed your mind.

content.title: ü§∑  You cannot vote for yourself
content.description: It's great that you believe in yourself, but voting for yourself is not allowed in this election.

content.title: üó≥Ô∏è  Your vote has been updated
content.description: You've just changed your vote from <@{prevUserId}> to <@{currentUserId}> for channel ownership.

content.title: üëã  {ownerDisplayName} abandoned his channel!
content.description:
<@{ownerId}> has been absent for more than {absentMinutes} minutes.
Will you be the one to take charge? Step up and claim it for yourself!

content.title: üëë  {candidatesCount} Candidates wish to claim this channel
content.description:
The countdown is on!
In just `{elapsedTimeFormatFraction}`, the voting will come to a close.
In case of a tie, <@{userInitiatorId}> will become the new owner.

{candidatesState}

content.title: üëë  {userInitiatorDisplayName} wish to claim this channel
content.description: Unless someone else steps up, <@{userInitiatorId}> will be the proud owner of this channel in just `{elapsedTimeFormatFraction}`.

content.title: üëë  {userWonDisplayName} has claimed the channel
content.description: {wonMessage}

wonMessage.{wonSomeoneElse}: <@{userWonId}> has claimed ownership of this channel, superseding ~~{previousOwnerDisplayName}~~ as the new owner!{results}
wonMessage.{wonSameOwner}: <@{userWonId}> has claimed ownership of this channel, he was already the owner! üòä{results}

content.title: üòà The action is disabled
content.description:
The action is disabled while the claim is in progress.

Please wait until the claim is completed.

content.title: ‡ºÑ Manage your Dynamic Channel
content.description:
Embrace the responsibility of overseeing your dynamic channel, diligently customizing it according to your discerning preferences.

Please be advised that the privilege to make alterations is vested solely of the channel owner.

_Current settings_:
- Name: **{name}**
- User Limit: ‚úã **{limit}**
- State: {state}
- Visibility State: {visibilityState}
- Region: üåç **{ region }**

content.title: üßπ  There are no messages available to clear
content.description: Keep in mind, that only non-embeds messages can be deleted.

content.title: üßπ  Chat was cleared the by {ownerDisplayName}!
content.description: Total of {totalMessages} messages.

content.title: üôÖ  User limit must be between {minValue} and {maxValue}
‚úã  Your channel's user limit has changed to {userLimit}
üôÖ  Failed to rename your channel
content.description: The word `{badword}` has been classified as inappropriate by the server administrator.

content.title: üôÖ You renamed your channel too fast!
content.description: Please wait `{elapsedTimeFormatFraction}` until the next rename{masterChannelMessage}

content.title: ‚úèÔ∏è  Your channel's name has changed to '{channelName}'
üë•  Manage permissions of your channel
content.footer: Use the menu below to manage permissions of your channel.

allowedUsersDisplay.{allowedUsersDefault}: Currently there are no granted users.

blockedUsersDisplay.{blockedUsersDefault}: Currently there are no blocked users.

blockedUsersDisplay.{blockedUsersDefault}: Currently there are no blocked users.

blockedUsersDisplay.{blockedUsersDefault}: Currently there are no blocked users.

content.footer: Use the menu below to manage permissions of your channel.

blockedUsersDisplay.{blockedUsersDefault}: Currently there are no blocked users.

content.title: üôà  The channel is hidden now

message.{messageDefault}: You can use **(`üë• Access`)** - _Button_ to manage the access of your channel.
message.{messageAccessNotAvailable}:
There is no way to grant access to your channel for new members.

This is because the **(üë• Access)** Button has been disabled by the administrator

content.footer: Use the menu below to manage permissions of your channel.

blockedUsersDisplay.{blockedUsersDefault}: Currently there are no blocked users.

message.{messageDefault}: You can use **(`üë• Access`)** - _Button_ to manage the access of your channel.
message.{messageAccessNotAvailable}:
There is no way to grant access to your channel for new members.

This is because the **(üë• Access)** Button has been disabled by the administrator

allowedUsersDisplay.{allowedUsersDefault}: Currently no other user has access except you.

content.title: üåê  The channel is public now
content.description:
Please be aware that your room is currently accessible to anyone.

Members **without** access will be able to enter the room unless it is hidden or set to private.

content.title: ü§ô  User unblocked
content.footer: Use the menu below to manage permissions of your channel.

allowedUsersDisplay.{allowedUsersDefault}: Currently there are no granted users.

blockedUsersDisplay.{blockedUsersDefault}: Currently there are no blocked users.

content.title: üîÉ  Dynamic Channel has been reset to default settings!

rateLimited.{rateLimitedDisplay}:
‚ö†Ô∏è Renaming cannot be performed at the moment due to rate limit restrictions.

Please wait for {elapsedTimeFormatFraction} seconds or create a new channel instead.

content.title: üîÄ  Transfer channel ownership
content.description:
Transfer channel ownership to another user.

Select the user to whom you want to transfer the channel.

content.title: üîÄ  Transfer channel ownership succeeded!
content.description: You are no longer the owner of this channel.

content.title: üîÄ  Transfer channel ownership
content.description:
Transfer channel ownership to {userDisplayName}.

‚ö†Ô∏è By transferring the channel ownership to another user, you will lose your ownership privileges.

Are you sure you want to transfer the channel ownership to **{userDisplayName}?**

content.title: # Oops! This component is restricted in this channel type.
üåç  Select language
content.description:
__Current Selected Language__: **{currentLanguage}**

Didn't find your language?

You can be the one to translate bot to your language!
contact us at our support server, and be the one!

Found mistake in translation? Please let us know!

content.title: üîê  Oops! Certain permissions are required
content.description:
Some permissions are required to proceed, **{omitterDisplayName}** is missing the following permissions:

{missingPermissions}

content.title: ü§∑  Nothing changed
content.description: This is may occur when you try to change something that is not changeable or is the same as before.

content.title: ‚õî  This is not your channel!
content.description:
But you can open your own channel :)

 Just click here: <#{masterChannelId}>

content.title: üéö  Edit Buttons Of Master Channel #{index}
content.description:
Editing buttons will impact the dynamic channels created by __Master Channel #{index}__.

There are have two options:

- Affect changes immediately to all channels
- Apply changes only to newly created _Dynamic Channels_.
content.footer: Current enabled buttons at the menu below

content.title: üéö  Edit Buttons Of Master Channel #{index}
content.description:
Select which buttons you wish to be visible for your members.

Only selected buttons will be enabled/visible at
_Dynamic Channels_ that created by this master channel.
content.footer: Current enabled buttons at the menu below

content.title: üîß  Configure Master Channel #{index}
content.footer: Note: Changing user mention will not affect already created dynamic channels.

content.title: üõ°Ô∏è  Edit Verified Roles Of Master Channel #{index}
content.footer: Note: The changes will only affect dynamic channels that change their state after the editing, the old roles in the channel will be be unchanged.

content.title: üõ†  Setup Vertix
content.description:
Discover the limitless possibilities of **Vertix**!
Customize and optimize your server to perfection.

To create a new master channel just click:
`(‚ûï Create Master Channel)` button.

Master Channels are dynamic voice channel generators, each with its own unique configuration.

Our badwords feature enables guild-level configuration for limiting dynamic channel names.

_**Current master channels**_:
{masterChannelMessage}

_Current badwords_:
{badwordsMessage}
content.footer: Tip: You can set logs channel by editing the master channel.

content.title: ü§∑  You have reached your master channels limit
content.description: You can create up to **{maxMasterChannels}** Master Channels in total.

content.title: Step 1 - Set Dynamic Channels Template Name
content.description:
You can specify a default name for dynamic channels that will be used when they are opened.

_Current template name_:
`{dynamicChannelNameTemplate}`

You can keep the default settings by pressing **( `Next ‚ñ∂` )** button.

Not sure how it works? Check out the [explanation](https://vertix.gg/setup/1).

content.title: Step 2 - Dynamic Channels Setup

footer.{defaultFooter}: Newly created dynamic channels through this master channel will be affected by the configuration you have selected.
footer.{noButtonsFooter}: Note: Without buttons members will not be able to manage their dynamic channels. no embed or interface will be shown to them.

content.title: Step 3 - Select Verified Roles
content.description:
Select the roles whose permissions will be impacted by the state of Dynamic Channel's.

Verified roles are not used in most cases, almost all the servers use the default settings.

Not sure how it works?, check out the [explanation](https://vertix.gg/setup/3).

**_üõ°Ô∏è Verified Roles_**

> {verifiedRolesDisplay}

You can keep the default settings by pressing **( `‚úì Finish` )** button.

content.title: ü§∑ Oops, an issue has occurred
content.description: Something went wrong

content.title: ‡ºÑ Vertix is here, let's get started!
content.description:
Welcome to Vertix, an incredible addition to your server!
Let's collaborate and make your server even better.

**Bot Setup**
- Type `/setup` or press `(üõ† Setup)` button.
- Click on `(‚ûï Create Master Channel)`
- Follow the steps.

Still not sure? Check out our [step by step](https://vertix.gg/posts/how-to-setup) guide.

You can always edit the configurations by using the `/setup` command.

If you need assistance or have any suggestions, feel free to join our Discord community server! We would be glad to help you and hear your feedback.

Join us at: https://discord.gg/dEwKeQefUU
